mapper.select: SELECT * FROM v_period_statistics_paid left JOIN v_period_statistics_cancel USING(paid_at) WHERE DATE(paid_at) = DATE(#{date})

SELECT * FROM v_address_statistics
WHERE DATE(paid_at) = DATE(#{date})
WHERE MONTH(paid_at) = MONTH(#{date})
WHERE YEAR(paid_at) = YEAR(#{date})

SELECT DISTINCT b.AREA_NO, b.AREA_NAME, (SELECT SUM(a.amount) FROM payment_info a WHERE SUBSTRING(a.buyer_addr, 1, 3) = b.AREA_NAME AND a.`status` != 'ready') AS AREA_PAYMENT FROM area b LEFT OUTER JOIN payment_info a ON(SUBSTRING(a.buyer_addr, 1, 3) = b.AREA_NAME)
WHERE DATE(a.paid_at) BETWEEN DATE(#{search.start_date}) AND DATE(#{search.end_date})
WHERE MONTH(a.paid_at) BETWEEN MONTH(#{search.start_date}) AND MONTH(#{search.end_date})
WHERE YEAR(a.paid_at) BETWEEN YEAR(#{search.start_date}) AND YEAR(#{search.end_date})
